home.title: Weleho's Lair
home.welcome_2: This is my personal website where you can find out more about me and my projects.
home.welcome_3: I hope you enjoy your stay!

about.title: About Me
about.section_1: I am a 20 year old software developer from Helsinki, Finland.
about.section_2:
I have a particular passion for game development, which is reflected on my projects.
And though game development is why I learned to code, programming in general has also become one of my favourite hobbies.
about.section_3: My current project is called 'Dungeons of Tavaraen', you can learn more about it and other games I have created down below.

Dungeons_of_Tavaraen.shortDesc: Roguelite RPG inspired by Tales of Maj'Eyal. Currently my most actively developed project, give it a try if you're interested!
Dungeons_of_Tavaraen.longDesc: Dungeons of Tavaraen is a roguelite game inspired by Tales of Maj'Eyal. It is based on a grid/tile movement system that dictates everything about combat. The game is still somewhat early in development, so expect to see bugs and unfinished features.

Memory_Cards.shortDesc: Simple memory card game based on Dark Souls III, made to practice React.

Pohjola_II.shortDesc: Turn based fighting game mostly made during one weekend. My most 'complete' project to date.

Pohjola_III.shortDesc: Turn based fighting game based on its prequel Pohjola II. Abandoned in favour of Dungeons of Tavaraen.

Tears_of_the_Evertree.shortDesc: TOTE was supposed to be my main project, it had plenty of time dedicated to it. Unfortunately, it is now an abandoned game.

My_Road.shortDesc: One of my earlier games, started because I didn't have internet one day and decided to program an interface. Had some simple attempts at creating an AI opponent.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.text: These are the technologies I have either used in my projects or have decent knowledge of. If you are in need of a different stack, I am always willing to grow my list of skills!
